gate.learning.learners.weka

Class WekaLearner

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.learners.weka.WekaLearner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    C45, KNNIBK, NaiveBayesC

    public abstract class WekaLearner
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The abstract class for Weka learner. It implements the training and applying methods for learners.
    See Also:
